respStmt.resp: TEI-compatible XML markup by Tyana Craig with corrections by Name, Name, and Name.
respStmt.name: Name

publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/06/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To cash to go to Boston 18/
To 20 lbs Bacon had last May 6cx
To shop from date at 20 Dollars pr year
By work as pr account rendered
To rent of House from April 1
To 21 lbs Cheese 8 1/2 c pr. lb
To cash to go to Boston
